author: Paul Smith
title: Virus could cut $894m from Australian tech market this year - The Australian Financial Review
description: Analysis by a global research group has warned of a dramatic cut in technology spending by Australian organisations this year as a result of COVID-19 savings.
content:
The report's modelling suggests a subsequent rebound to 4.3 per cent growth in tech spending in 2021, in similar fashion to the sudden contraction and recovery that occurred in the global financial crisis of 2007-8.
Mr Higgins said that while natural disaste… [+5003 chars]
